name: Broodmother of Leng
description: The Broodmother of Leng is a massive aberration with a chaotic evil demeanor, possessing a grotesque appearance and a multitude of arachnid traits. She commands spider allies and is known for her dark and powerful spells.
memorable: Her ability to summon swarms of spiderlings and retaliate with poisonous blood makes her a chilling presence.
goals: To dominate and control through fear and manipulation, using her spider allies.
relations: Often accompanied by various arachnid creatures and potential cultists or followers.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas such as caves or abandoned ruins.
strengths: Strong melee combatant with the ability to cast a variety of spells and summon reinforcements.
weaknesses: Less effective at ranged combat, vulnerable to attacks from afar.
attacks: Powerful claw attacks delivering heavy slashing and poison damage, as well as the ability to spit venom at range.
most_powerful_ability: Call Brood enables her to summon swarms of spiderlings to overwhelm her foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 240 feet, allowing her to see in complete darkness.
skills: Skilled in stealth and intimidation, enhancing her ability to strike fear into her enemies.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and various conditions like being charmed or unconscious.
Can read and utilize any scroll due to her Eldritch Understanding.
Poisonous Blood ability punishes melee attackers with poison damage.
Innate spellcasting allows her to cast a range of powerful spells without components.
Tactically redirects attacks to her spider allies with Protect the Future ability.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability allows her to cast charm person, chill touch, comprehend languages, detect magic at will, and hold person, suggestion, thunderwave three times a day.
test_queries: poisonous blood attacking creature in melee
dark creature skilled in stealth and intimidation
